A golden chef's hat is a possible reward from an easy clue scroll. Like the chef's hat, it can be used to enter the Cooks' Guild.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The examine text "What a perfectly reasonable hat." is a reference to the examine text of a chef's hat, which says "What a silly hat."
